com.io7m.r2.meshes.tools

Interface R2MeshConverterType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2MeshConverter

    public interface R2MeshConverterType
    The type of mesh converters.

      • loadMeshesFromFileInferred

        void loadMeshesFromFileInferred(Path p)
        Load all meshes from the given file. The format will be inferred from the file suffix.
        Parameters:
        p - The file

        name - The mesh name (not used for all formats)
